START_BILL_TIME = #{startBillTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BIG_TICKET_GOODS = #{bigTicketGoods,jdbcType=CHAR},
START_CENTRALIZED_SETTLEMENT = #{startCentralizedSettlement,jdbcType=CHAR}, ARRIVE_CENTRALIZED_SETTLEMENT = #{arriveCentralizedSettlement,jdbcType=CHAR}, START_CONTRACT_ORG_CODE = #{startContractOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVE_CONTRACT_ORG_CODE = #{arriveContractOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_REMINDER_ORG_CODE = #{startReminderOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVE_REMINDER_ORG_CODE = #{arriveReminderOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS_NOTE = #{receiveCustomerAddressNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS_NOTE = #{deliveryCustomerAddressNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_BATCH_CREATE_WAYBILL = #{isBatchCreateWaybill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIN_TRANSPORT_FEE = #{minTransportFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SORTING_RESULT = #{sortingResult,jdbcType=CHAR},
FLABELLEAVEMONTH = #{flabelleavemonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SORTING_RESULT= #{entity.sortingResult,jdbcType=CHAR}
where waybill_no = #{oldWaybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

#{exceptionGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVER_REGION_CODE = #{deliverRegionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENERATE_GOODS_QTY = #{generateGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYMENT_TYPE = channelCustId= #{channelCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_AREA_CODE = #{goodsAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INVOICE = #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, special_offer_NO=#{specialOffer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_BILL_TIME=#{startBillTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, special_offer_NO=#{specialOffer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arriveCentralizedSettlement,jdbcType=CHAR}, START_CONTRACT_ORG_CODE = #{startContractOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVE_CONTRACT_ORG_CODE = #{arriveContractOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIAL_VALUE_ADDED_SERVICE=#{specialValueAddedServiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT
GENERATE_GOODS_QTY = GENERATE_GOODS_QTY + #{generateGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DC_SERVICEFEE = #{dcServicefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100,
WHERE WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT
GENERATE_GOODS_QTY = DECODE(SIGN(GENERATE_GOODS_QTY - #{generateGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}), 1, GENERATE_GOODS_QTY - #{generateGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0),
ARRANGE_GOODS_QTY = DECODE(SIGN(ARRANGE_GOODS_QTY - #{arrangeGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}), 1, ARRANGE_GOODS_QTY - #{arrangeGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0),
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GENERATE_GOODS_QTY > (ARRIVE_GOODS_QTY - ARRIVE_NOTOUT_GOODS_QTY)

UPDATE PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT
ARRIVE_NOTOUT_GOODS_QTY = ARRIVE_NOTOUT_GOODS_QTY + #{arriveNotoutGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GENERATE_GOODS_QTY = DECODE(SIGN(GENERATE_GOODS_QTY - #{generateGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}), 1, GENERATE_GOODS_QTY - #{generateGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0),
ARRANGE_GOODS_QTY = DECODE(SIGN(ARRANGE_GOODS_QTY - #{arrangeGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}), 1, ARRANGE_GOODS_QTY - #{arrangeGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0),
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT
SETTLE_STATUS = #{settleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
SETTLE_TIME = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELIVERYMAN_NAME = #{deliverymanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTIFY_TYPE = #{identifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTIFY_CODE = #{identifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COD_IDENTIFY_CODE = #{codIdentifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COD_IDENTIFY_TYPE = #{codIdentifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT
ARRIVE_TIME = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARRIVE_GOODS_QTY = #{arriveGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARRIVE_NOTOUT_GOODS_QTY = #{arriveNotoutGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELIVERY_TIME_INTERVAL = #{deliveryTimeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_TIME_START = #{deliveryTimeStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_TIME_OVER = #{deliveryTimeOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVER_BILL_QTY = #{deliverBillQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT
GENERATE_GOODS_QTY =#{generateGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARRANGE_GOODS_QTY = #{arrangeGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARRIVE_GOODS_QTY = #{arriveGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and GENERATE_GOODS_QTY = #{oldGenerateGoodsQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
UPDATE PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT A SET A.STATUS =#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},A.MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE A.waybill_no =#{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELIVERY_TIME_INTERVAL = #{deliveryTimeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_TIME_INTERVAL = null,
INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_TYPE = null,
DELIVERY_TIME_START = #{deliveryTimeStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_TIME_START =null,
DELIVERY_TIME_OVER = #{deliveryTimeOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_TIME_OVER = null,
NOTIFICATION_ORG_CODE = #{notificationOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVER_DATE = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UP_DELIVER_DATE_ORG_CODE = #{upDeliverDateOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVER_DATE = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELIVER_BILL_QTY = nvl(DELIVER_BILL_QTY, 0) + #{deliverBillQtyAdd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELIVER_BILL_QTY = 0,
DELIVER_BILL_QTY = DECODE(SIGN(DELIVER_BILL_QTY - #{deliverBillQtyReduce,jdbcType=DECIMAL}), 1, DELIVER_BILL_QTY - #{deliverBillQtyReduce,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0),
WAYBILL_NO in
#{waybillNo}
WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WAYBILL_NO = ''
and nvl(DELIVER_BILL_QTY, 0) = #{oldDeliverBillQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and ARRANGE_GOODS_QTY<=0
